channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Psychology of Retirement Income: From Saving to Spending
item.description: Are you lost in the retirement consumption puzzle? The narrative of a miserly, Scrooge-like figure hoarding his wealth for years instead of enjoying his retirement might seem unbelievable—but unfortunately, it isn’t relegated only to fiction.

item.title: Auto industry’s shift toward EVs is expected to go on despite Trump threat to kill tax credits
item.description: If President-elect Donald Trump makes good on his threat to kill federal tax credits for electric vehicle purchases, it’s likely that fewer buyers will choose EVs.

item.title: Last 2 defendants await their fate as long-running YSL trial ends after a year of testimony
item.description: After almost a year of testimony, closing statements began in the YSL gang and racketeering trial that included rapper Young Thug.
